mapper.insert: insert into `users` (username, password, type, deleted) values (#{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.type}, #{user.deleted})
mapper.select: select users.id user_id, username, password, type, users.deleted user_deleted, roles.id role_id, name, roles.deleted role_deleted, system_menus.id menu_id, permission, resource, system_menus.deleted menu_deleted from users left join users_roles on users.id = users_roles.user_id left join roles on users_roles.role_id = roles.id left join roles_menus on roles.id = roles_menus.role_id left join system_menus on system_menus.id = roles_menus.menu_id where #{userId} = users.id
